title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for midpoint Riemann sum

1 point is earned for answer

1 point is earned for meaning of integral

∫ 0 50 v ( t )dt

≈ 10[ v (5)+ v (15)+ v (25)+ v (35)+ v (45)]

=10(12+30+70+81+60)

=2530 feet

This integral is the total distance traveled in feet over the time 0 to 50 seconds.
